QuestionStem: Which descriptions identify areas of science that physical oceanographers might need to use to answer questions about the topic listed? Choose all that apply.

options.AnswerText: A. chemistry and physics to study how currents and salinity are related
B. physics and geology to study the transport of sand on and off beaches
C. biology, chemistry, geology, and physics to study the interactions of the atmosphere and the ocean

CorrectFeedback: Physical oceanographers need knowledge of different areas of science to answer questions about most topics in their field.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Think about how each phenomenon would be related to different areas of science.
IncorrectFeedback: Think about how each phenomenon would be related to different areas of science.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: Physical oceanographers need knowledge of different areas of science to answer questions about most topics in their field.
